channel.title: Deth glitch on delta
channel.description:
Hey on my server everyone keeps logging in and randomly dieing... but me
I am using deltascape /xscape source.. and i cant seem to get the problem of why everyone is randomly dieing upon login..
Can you please tell me how to fix this glitch?
Thanks much appreciated

item.title: Deth glitch on delta
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

It’s called…ANTI-LEECH. It was made for all you noobs that just take sources and change nothing on them, then call them your own. Learn to code before you host a server.

The solution is quite easy…

Read full topic

item.description:
@FireClan wrote:

i have same problem i also got delta source by php coder same happend when i get about 35 ppl they logg in and die

Read full topic

item.title: Deth glitch on delta
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

[quote=“I PK Pigeons, post:4, topic:260892”][quote author=lysolmax link=topic=344478.msg2658196#msg2658196 date=1234013375]
sorry, i cannot help, because i have never played deltascape… never seems to work for me. but i have had that prob before. this is what works for me, spam while logging in, so 1ce u click enter serve just start spamming, and it should work note this is a dif serv so mite not work
[/quote]

Wtf?..

Kalvin, Look for the applydead() method around somewhere, it may be being called when somebody logs in, and it kills them.
I’m not sure, but it could be the problem.[/quote]

i tried every possible word i can think of related to death and it hasnt found anything… in the client.java :S… can anyonhe else help?

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2009, 07:46:02 am[/size][hr][quote=“I PK Pigeons, post:4, topic:260892”][quote author=lysolmax link=topic=344478.msg2658196#msg2658196 date=1234013375]
sorry, i cannot help, because i have never played deltascape… never seems to work for me. but i have had that prob before. this is what works for me, spam while logging in, so 1ce u click enter serve just start spamming, and it should work note this is a dif serv so mite not work
[/quote]

Wtf?..

Kalvin, Look for the youdied() method around somewhere, it may be being called when somebody logs in, and it kills them.
I’m not sure, but it could be the problem.[/quote]

Heres all the codes that have “youdie” in them

public void youdied() { if(playerHasItem(5509)){ deleteItem(5509, 1); } if(playerHasItem(5510)){ deleteItem(5510, 1); } if(playerHasItem(5512)){ deleteItem(5512, 1); } if(playerHasItem(5514)){ deleteItem(5514, 1); } if(playerHasItem(6570)){ keep6570 = true; deleteItem(6570, 1); } if (!isSkulled) { keepItemHandle(); } if (ProtItem) { applyProtectItemProt(); } for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) { try {

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) { client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; youdied(); killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+"."); }

Read full topic

item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

sorry, i cannot help, because i have never played deltascape… never seems to work for me. but i have had that prob before. this is what works for me, spam while logging in, so 1ce u click enter serve just start spamming, and it should work note this is a dif serv so mite not work

Wtf?..

Kalvin, Look for the youdied() method around somewhere, it may be being called when somebody logs in, and it kills them.
I’m not sure, but it could be the problem.
